mapper.update: update t_use_list set use_cost = use_cost + #{useCost}, use_yn = 1 where goal_id = #{goalId} and date = curdate()
mapper.select: select date, name notTodo from t_use_list tul inner join t_monthly_goal tmg on tul.goal_id = tmg.goal_id inner join t_not_todo tnt on tmg.not_todo_id = tnt.not_todo_id where use_yn = 1 and date_format(date, '%Y-%m') = #{yearMonth}

select name notTodo, cost_category costCategoryId, use_cost useCost from t_use_list tul inner join t_monthly_goal tmg on tul.goal_id = tmg.goal_id inner join t_not_todo tnt on tmg.not_todo_id = tnt.not_todo_id where date = #{day}
